Texts.Chs:
从跳跃花中提取。是一种重度A级麻醉剂。
^cyan;+^white;20% ^cyan;能量回复^gray;, ^cyan;中毒醉酒^gray;, ^red;-^white;30 ^red;防御^gray;, ^red;致疯^reset; (220s)
Texts.Eng:
Extracted from Capriole flowers. A heavy class-A narcotic.
^cyan;+^white;20% ^cyan;Energy Regen^gray;, ^cyan;Heavily Intoxicated^gray;, ^red;-^white;30 ^red;Defense^gray;, ^red;Insanity^reset; (220s)
